abusefilter-warning:
'''Gʋ'ʋsim:''' Ba gɔs tʋʋmkaŋa ka li mɔr bɛ'ɛdi li na san'am yɛla.
Tʋʋmbanɛ pʋ mɔr  sʋ'ʋŋiri kenna, ba na yisi ba tɔ'ɔtɔ,
ka fʋ mɛ ya'a sɔbid sɔb bɛ'ɛdnam bɛɛ yiiti dɛmis ka li pʋ mɔr sʋ'ʋŋirɛ ka fʋ lɛn niŋ ala saŋa bɛdegʋ, ba na gu'u fʋ akaunt bɛɛ fʋ IP adɛris.
Fʋ ya'a gɔs ka tʋʋma la mɔr sʋ'ʋŋir, fʋ tun'e  lɛn paasi li ya'as ka li pa'al ye li an sʋ'ʋm.
Sɔnsig giŋ linɛ pa'an bʋmbɛ'ɛd linɛ ka fʋ tʋʋma la nwɛnim anɛ: $1
abusefilter-disallowed:
Ba gɔsya ka tʋʋmkaŋa ka' sʋ'ʋm ka na tun'e mɔr yɛlbɛ'ɛdi kenna, din ka ba pʋ siak ye li bɛ kpɛla la.
Fʋ ya'a tisi fʋ mɛŋ sida ye fʋ tʋʋma la an sʋ'ʋm ka na mɔr sʋŋiri kenna, fʋn yɛlim tʋʋma la kpɛɛm fʋn bɔɔdin ye fʋ maal si'el.
Sɔnsig giŋ linɛ pa'an bʋmbɛ'ɛd linɛ ka fʋ tʋʋma la pa'an anɛ:: $1
abusefilter-blocked-display:
Ba gɔs tʋʋmkaŋa ka li mɔr bɛ'ɛd li na san'am yɛla,
alazug, ba gʋ'ʋf ka fʋ kʋ tun'e maali lii.
Dinɛ lɛn paas,ban na niŋ si'em gʋ' {{SITENAME}} la, anɛ ye ba gu' fʋ tʋʋma akaunt nɛ dinɛ wʋsa tʋm nɛ IP adɛris wʋsa ka fʋ kʋ lɛn tun'e maal dɛmisɛ.
Ka li ya'a anɛ ban niŋi linɛ ka zi', fʋn mɔɔm ka sɔnsi tis tʋʋma la kpɛɛm.
Sɔnsig giŋ linɛ pa'an bʋmbɛ'ɛd linɛ ka fʋ tʋʋma la pa'an anɛ: $1
abusefilter-degrouped:
Ba gɔs tʋʋmkaŋa ka li mɔr bɛ'ɛd li na san'am yɛla.
Alazug, ba pʋ siaki tisi lii. Ka din pa'al ye fʋ akaunt la pʋ lɛn mɔr zi'esim sʋŋ la zug, fʋ pʋ lɛn mɔr suori na maal si'el nɛ lii.
Fʋ ya'a tɛn'ɛs ka ban niŋ si'em la pʋ nara,fʋn sɔns nɛ birokarat la tua'asi tis o linɛ maal ka ba lɛn tisif suor ya'as.
Sɔnsig giŋ linɛ pa'an bʋmbɛ'ɛd linɛ ka fʋ tʋʋma la pa'an anɛ: $1
abusefilter-autopromote-blocked:
Ba gɔs tʋʋmkaŋa ka li mɔr bɛ'ɛd linɛ na san'am yɛla ka kʋ nyaŋi tʋm tʋʋma.
Dinɛ lɛn paas, dinɛ na kɛ ka bʋmbama kʋ lɛm maal anɛ ye suobanɛ ka ba tisif ka fʋ na tun'e maal akauntnam la, ba yisi ba fʋ akauntin la saŋa bi'ela.
Sɔnsig giŋ linɛ pa'an bʋmbɛ'ɛd linɛ ka fʋ tʋʋma la pa'an anɛ $1
abusefilter-log-search-action-label: Linɛ kɛ ka ba tʋm ala
